title: Trump Fires Warning Shot in Battle Between Bannon and Kushner
description: Mr. Trump is considering a shift in roles for his chief strategist, Stephen Bannon, who has become isolated as other White House power centers have grown.
author: Jeremy W. Peters and Maggie Haberman
Javier C. Hernández
description: After President Xi Jinping went to Mar-a-Lago, Chinese state-controlled news outlets offered some hints about how the visit was perceived back home.
title: What Chinese News Reports Tell Us About Beijing’s View of Trump
